channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10962] Decouple region opening (HM and HRS) from ZK
item.description:
This involves creating consensus class to be kept by ConsensusProvider interface, and modifications of the following classes:

  • HRS side (OpenRegionHandler, OpenMetaHandler, and few accompanying changes in HRegionServer code and RsRpcServices)
  • HM side (OpenedRegionHandler, may be some changes in AssignmentManager)
item.summary: Decouple region opening (HM and HRS) from ZK

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
First version of patch.

Includes changes made as part of HBASE-10915, as the factory and consensus provider stuff is apparently needed here too.

TestCloseRegionHandler and TestRegionServerNoMaster pass, 1 out of 6 tests in TestOpenRegionHandler doesn't pass, I'm looking why. Will fix in next version of patch.

A comment - like in patch for closing regions, have to pass around open..details object, to transform handler instances created on per-executors-task basis to stateless single instance of consensus without bringing in syncronization.

This patch is a bit WIP, but would definitely appreciate first reviews at this point.
Fixed test in TestOpenRegionHandler. Patch ready for first review (apologies for it's being too big).

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12639897/HBASE-10962.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12639897

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 9 new or modified tests.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

-1 lineLengths. The patch introduces the following lines longer than 100:
+ public boolean tickleOpening(OpenRegionDetails ord, HRegionInfo regionInfo, RegionServerServices rsServices,
+ final HRegionInfo hri, OpenRegionDetails ord) {
+ public boolean tryTransitionFromOpeningToFailedOpen(final HRegionInfo hri, OpenRegionDetails ord) {
+ OpenRegionHandler handler = new OpenRegionHandler(server, rss, hri, htd, consensus.getOpenRegionConsensus(),
+ ZkOpenRegionConsensus openRegionConsensus = new ZkOpenRegionConsensus(consensus, server.getZooKeeper()) {
+ public boolean transitionToOpened(final HRegion r, OpenRegionDetails ord) throws IOException {
+ OpenRegionHandler handler = new OpenRegionHandler(server, rss, hri, htd, openRegionConsensus, zkCrd);
+ new OpenRegionHandler(server, rsServices, TEST_HRI, TEST_HTD, consensus.getOpenRegionConsensus(),
+ new OpenRegionHandler(server, rsServices, TEST_HRI, TEST_HTD, consensus.getOpenRegionConsensus(), zkCrd) {
+ ZkOpenRegionConsensus openRegionConsensus = new ZkOpenRegionConsensus(consensus, server.getZooKeeper()) {

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:

-1 core zombie tests. There are 2 zombie test(s): at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TestTableMapReduceBase.testMultiRegionTable(TestTableMapReduceBase.java:96)
at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.wal.TestLogRolling.testLogRollOnDatanodeDeath(TestLogRolling.java:368)

Oops. Missed those lines. Will update the patch shortly...

@Mikhail:
Can you put the patch on review board ?

Thanks
Ted Yu Sure, will do shortly.
Ted Yu shall I also put there patch for HBASE-10915?

That would help other reviewers.

Thanks
Here it is: https://reviews.apache.org/r/20338/
Merged patch with the work made for consensus inftra; that includes RS side only, for initial review - will post updated patch with HM side shortly.
